code: import Name from"../../../Name";import TemperatureRange from"../../../TemperatureRange";import WeatherIcon from"../../../WeatherIcon";import Date from"../../../Date";import Temperature from"./components/Temperature";import Meta from"./components/Meta";import Image from"./components/Image";import bgCloudy from"../../../../assets/background/Cloudy_day_background.png";import getWeatherIcon from"../../utils/getWeatherIcon/getWeatherIcon";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CurrentCity=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;if(!data)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-between p-4 md:max-lg:p-3 h-full w-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{imageUrl:bgCloudy,alt:"Cloudy",className:"absolute top-0 right-0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Date,{value:data.dateTime,className:"text-slate text-sm sm:text-lg md:text-xxs lg:text-sm xl:text-base"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Name,{value:data.city,className:"text-white text-2xl sm:3xl font-bold m-2 md:max-lg:text-lg xl:text-3xl md:max-lg:m-0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Temperature,{value:data.temp,className:"text-slate text-5xl sm:text-7xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl xl:text-6xl font-bold mt-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TemperatureRange,{minValue:data.tempRange.min,maxValue:data.tempRange.max,className:"text-slate text-base sm:text-lg md:max-lg:text-sm"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WeatherIcon,{imageUrl:getWeatherIcon(data.condition),alt:data.condition,className:"w-2/3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Meta,{humidity:data.humidity,windSpeed:data.windSpeed,uvIndex:data.uvIndex,feelsLike:data.feelsLike})]});};export default CurrentCity;
